info.name: Manga0205 Wordpress Dark Theme
info.description: Changes Manga2050's Wordpress page to look more similar to Firefox's reader mode w/ some minor changes to suit my personal preferences.
info.additionalInfo:
Version 1.3 - Fixed up all the problems I could find a way to fix in this style.
Version 1.2a  - Fixed blog follow button text color
Version 1.2 - Changed the blog name/link text at the top of the page.
Version 1.1  - Changed comments font size and line spacing.
Version 1.0 - Released.

---
Note: I originally made this style with a kinda bad understanding of CSS, I haven't suddenly become a master of CSS or anything but I have gotten a better understanding of CSS since I made this so I decided to update the style.
